Classes
Class
Description
AboutDialog
Creates the "About" dialog from the menu.
BusinessAsUsual
Generate the savings associated with moving to a different tariff plan and from generating own energy.
CEREITableCellRenderer
A class for rendering Result tables in the form specified by the client.
CEREITableModel
Extension of the Default Table Model so Cells cannot be edited.
Cost
Calculates and Summarises Cost data from the Source Usage and Spot Price .csv files TO DO - Refactor.
CostEffectiveRenewableEnergyInvestments
Cost-Effective Renewable Energy Investments --- Program to process and display Electrical Energy costs, efficiencies, savings and return on investment.
CostPerMonth
Low level working class that provides most of the detail functionality used to calculate costs and PEIs Could do with refactoring to separate out Cost and PEI with some commonality in a yet to be designed parent class
DateParser
Dates in Energy Usage, Spot Price, Energy Used and Feed-in Tariff files have varying formats.
GoButton
Simple button that triggers Calculation
InputFile
Creates a JPanel containing a JButton and a Label below the button.
InputTypeFilter
Input files should have .csv extension.
LifecycleCostAnalysis
Performs the lifecycle cost analysis of a proposal contained in the Lifecycle costs file, using additional savings and cost information if they have been calculated.
LifecycleCostComponent
Individual components of a project for the purposes of conducting a financial analysis of a project.
MenuBar
A simple menu bar on the top of the energy calculator
Meter
12 months worth of parameters that pertain to a particular meter.
MeterSummary
Holds summary cost OR PEI results for each meter.
MonthlyParameter
Collect the per meter per month parameters of Loss Ratio Demand Capacity Usage and Demand Critical Peak Usage
NetworkParameter
Loads the various tariffs, per monthly and per meter per monthly from the "Network Tariff" input file TO DO - Validation of all fields in the input file.
Parameter
Collect the per month parameters that apply to all meters
PEI
Simply calculates the PEI from the relevant information.
PEIPerMonth
Low level working class that provides most of the detail functionality used to calculate PEIs Could do with refactoring to separate out Cost and PEI with some commonality in a yet to be designed parent class
ResetButton
Simple button that triggers reset of input files.
ResultsPanel
Panel that holds all the results of the EnergyCalculator calculations - added as a tab in the JTabbedPane in the gui.
SaveCostDetails
Saves the detailed cost information to a .csv file
SaveCostSummary
Saves the data in the Cost summary Jtable (displayed on one of the GUI panes) to a .csv file
SaveLifecycleDetails
Saves the detailed financial analysis to a .csv file
SaveLifecycleSummary
Saves the data in the Lifecycle Cost Analysis summary Jtable (displayed on one of the GUI panes) to a .csv file
SavePeiSummary
Saves the data in the PEI Jtable (displayed on one of the GUI panes) to a .csv file
SaveSavingsSummary
Saves the data in the CostSavings summary JTable (displayed on one of the GUI panes) to a .csv file
